summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to prepare plans, specifications and estimates and to replace or rehabilitate a sewer line in the alley east of 46th Avenue South between South Willow Street and South Frontenac Street; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1981 Budget of the Engineering Department; and making appropriations from the Engineering Operating and Sewer Funds therefor.
